testStage.description: User tries to refuel using manual flow

steps.name: I check that the Saucelabs session is preserved

parameters.name: userProfile
parameters.value: {PHONE_COUNTRY=Poland, BUSINESS_UNIT=DK, PHONE_NUMBER=781781000, PASSWORD=#Test123, EMAIL=janina.kowalska@gmaptest.com, FIRST_NAME=Janina, PHONE_COUNTRY_PREFIX=+48, OTP=000000, LAST_NAME=Kowalska}

steps.name: I skip linking my card
I return to the "Home Screen"
I accept Updated Terms and Conditions
I close "Tell Us What You Think Pane"
I check that the "Home Screen" is displayed
I skip linking my card
I mock the location of the device to "DENMARK_10888"
I click on "ACCOUNT" button
I check that the "Account Screen" is displayed
I check that the "Profile" tab is displayed
I click on "BUILD NUMBER" tab
I click on "SET LOCATION" button
I enter the location data of the "DENMARK_10888" station
I check "Set Location" page is visible
I enter the site ID "DENMARK_10888" in the input
I click on "SET LOCATION" button
I click on "Car Wash" advertisement
I check if "Car Wash" advertisement is displayed
I close and open application
I make sure that the location is set correctly
I check that the "Home Screen" is displayed
I make sure that the "BUY FUEL" tab is in the default state
I click on "CAR NOT DETECTED?" button
I check that the "Select Your Pump Screen" is displayed
I select 1st/nd/rd/th enabled pump
I click on "CONFIRM PUMP NUMBER" button
I check that the "Payment Details Screen" is displayed
I get the text from the pump number
I check that the application text: "1" is equals to expected value: "1"
I clear the text in "MAXIMUM PURCHASE" input
I enter the maximum purchase "1500" in the input
I click on "AUTHORIZE" button
I check that the "Home Screen" is displayed
I check if the progress bar on the "BUY FUEL" tab is advancing
I close "Tell Us What You Think Pane"
I click on "CLOSE" button
I click on "TRANSACTION HISTORY" button
I check that the "Activity History Screen" is displayed
I close "Tell Us What You Think Pane" on Activity History page
I get the text from the "1"st/nd/rd/th activity history "DATE" element
I check that the application text: "Mar 27, 2025" is equals to expected value: "Mar 27, 2025"
I get the text from the "1"st/nd/rd/th activity history "TAGS" element
I check that the application text: "Fuel" is equals to expected value: "Fuel"
I get the text from the "1"st/nd/rd/th activity history "PRICE" element
I check that the actual value: "1499.98" is close to value "1500.0" with margin "1.0"
I click on "1"st/nd/rd/th activity history element
I check that the "Activity History Details Screen" is displayed
I get the text from the "TOTAL" text
I check that the actual value: "1499.98" is close to value "1500.0" with margin "1.0"
I get the text from the "TOTAL" text
I check that the application text: "DKK" is equals to expected value: "DKK"
I get the text from the "DATE" text
I check that the application text: "Mar 27, 2025" is equals to expected value: "Mar 27, 2025"
I get the text from the "ORDER ID" text
I check that the application text: "AAJA10888250327144629048989" isn't empty
I get the text from the "PAYMENT METHOD" text
I check that the application text: "4444" is equals to expected value: "4444"

labels.name: parentSuite
labels.value: GMAP EU Mobile Test Automation - [IOS PARALLEL XML SUITE]
